beer.beer_description: Brewed with Australian and UK malts, this ESB brings rich flavours of raisin, toffee, and fruitcake spice, balanced by citrusy, herbal notes from East Kent Goldings hops. Classic, complex, and deeply satisfying.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 40 check-ins with a photo.

user.bio: Trying to drink as many new beers as possible...

beer.beer_description: Brewed with Australian and UK malts, this ESB brings rich flavours of raisin, toffee, and fruitcake spice, balanced by citrusy, herbal notes from East Kent Goldings hops. Classic, complex, and deeply satisfying.

items.badge_description: Whether you’re feeling extra special or extra strong, stopping by the local pub for a delicious Extra Special / Strong Bitter or English Bitter is always a good decision! That's 20 different beers with the style of Extra Special / Strong Bitter or English Bitter. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 480 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 97! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
